recipe.title: Ham, Manchego, and Fig Tartines
ingredients: 1 (24-inch) baguette, quartered crosswise, then each quarter halved horizontally and lightly toasted
6 ounces thinly sliced serrano ham or prosciutto
1/4 pound Manchego, thinly sliced with a vegetable peeler
instructions: Stir together butter and fig preserves. Spread mixture on baguette, then make open-face sandwiches with ham and cheese. Drizzle with oil and season with pepper.
